name: Rung
description:
Connect Rung with Pipefy to track your important alerts and notifications. The Rung Power-Up allows you to:

- Install a Rung extension from Pipefy and link to a card
- Get real-time updates on your Rung alerts
- See your Rung alerts inside Pipefy and Rung
short_description: Connect Rung with Pipefy to track your important alerts and notifications.
author: Rung Developers Team
